title: Question 16
prompt: (1) Suzie and Stacey both worked at the music store in the mall. (2) Suzie met Stacey when she started working there two years ago. (3) They often take their lunch breaks together and talk and gossip about their classmates. (4) Playing tennis is one of Stacey's favorite hobbies. (5) Because their friendship has grown, they decided that one day they would like to open up a music store of their own.
description: Read the paragraph. Then choose the sentence that does not belong in the paragraph.
feedback: Sentence 4 does not belong in the paragraph.  The topic sentence is about Suzie and Stacey working together.  The sentence about Suzie playing tennis isn’t relevant to the rest of the paragraph about Suzie and Stacey’s friendship.
